long_description: Satisfy your hunger after a long day on the trail with the AlpineAire Pineapple Orange Chicken freeze-dried dinner. Contains white meat chicken, rice with pineapple and red and green bell peppers. Easy to prepare in its own foil pouch; just add boiling water and stir, let stand for 10 - 12 min., and then serve. Nutrition facts displayed here and on packaging may differ; information on packaging reflects actual contents. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Satisfy your hunger after a long day on the trail with the AlpineAire Pineapple Orange Chicken freeze-dried dinner.
